items.content_html: LitUI Elements is a modern, lightweight UI component library built with Lit, designed to help developers quickly and efficiently create stunning web applications. Inspired by the simplicity and flexibility of Lit, LitUI Elements provides a comprehensive set of reusable, customizable UI components that can easily integrate into any web project.
items.title: pouim/LitUI-Elements: LitUI Elements is a modern, lightweight UI component library built with Lit, designed to help developers quickly and efficiently create stunning web applications. Inspired by the simplicity and flexibility of Lit, LitUI Elements provides a comprehensive set of reusable, customizable UI components that can easily integrate into any web project.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: React Hook Form is a lightweight, flexible, and performant library for handling form validations and management in React applications. It embraces the power of React hooks, providing a simple API that reduces the amount of code needed to build and manage forms, enhancing both developer productivity and application performance.
items.title: SherazArif172/react-hook-form: React Hook Form is a lightweight, flexible, and performant library for handling form validations and management in React applications. It embraces the power of React hooks, providing a simple API that reduces the amount of code needed to build and manage forms, enhancing both developer productivity and application performance.
